divs: sighting detailsi was driving southbound on i-95 between exits 8 and 7 in stamford ct at 2:24 pm. it was a cloudless sunny day. something caught my eye i glanced up to my left and saw an extremely bright stationary object at about a 10:00 position in the daylight sky. it was shockingly bright and round in shape approx 3\4 inch in diameter from my position in the driver's seat. it was as bright as light reflecting off a mirror. i thought it might be the sun reflecting off a plane, but it was too large, much too bright and a little too low to be an aircraft. to my relief, the brightness gave way to a flat and dull grey sliver shape. i had thought it was plane after all. i looked away for a 1\2 a second and when i returned to look at the object and it was completely gone from view - vanished. i searched the sky - nothing. in the farthest distance i could see the trails of an airplane. i work for an airline and live in fairfield county where there are always planes overhead. it was very wierd. i'm still holding out for a logical explaination.
Summary: extremely bright light in daylight sky that quickly vanished
